      • getComments

        public SearchResult getComments(int imageID,
                                User user,
                                int requestedPage,
                                int pageSize,
                                java.lang.String howToOrder,
                                javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        To get comments in one page
        参数:
        imageID - imageID
        user - The user
        requestedPage - requestedPage
        pageSize - pageSize: how many elements are there on one page?
        howToOrder - Two options. "time" and "popularity"
        request - The HttpServletRequest
        返回:
        SearchResult Object
